ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This study was funded by the Faculty Research Grant of the Faculty of Medicine, University of Ruhuna, Sri Lanka. The authors are grateful to the technical officers and other nonacademic staff members at the Departments of Biochemistry, Microbiology, and Nuclear Medicine Unit, Faculty of Medicine, University of Ruhuna, Sri Lanka, for their technical and other assistance to make the present study a success.
